odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Forms part of the archives of the Milan Area Historical Society.

archdesc.bioghist: Settlers to Milan, Michigan. One family member, Ruth Farmer was a graduate of Michigan State Normal College and a teacher in Detroit.
archdesc.scopecontent: Family genealogy; warranty deeds, tax receipts, and other business and land records; also scrapbook containing photocopies of obituary notices of Milan citizens; guest registers from funeral visitations; and photograph albums and other family photographs.

c01.scopecontent: Photograph albums (1860s-1930s), daguerreotypes, and a DVD of photographs of members of the David Blackmer and Zeriah Blackmer family of Milan; also album and other photos of Ruth Farmer, daughter of Will Farmer and Cynthia Blackmer, mainly of Farmer family members.
